Reviews.Title: I Saved Money With These
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: These were about half the price of what I could find anywhere else and they're as good as any.

Reviews.Title: Inferior quality- not recommended
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: For the life of me, I cannot understand other high ratings of this product!  I have worked with electronics for many years and personally, I am very disappointed in the quality of this product.  The conductors (the amount of actual wire) within each cable is so minimal that I was concerned about using them for my camera's power.  I purchased 6 of them and ended up not even using s single one- I just didn't trust power running through the very thin wires.  I researched online and ended up purchasing a different connector at a different place ([...]).  Disappointingly inferior quality!

Reviews.Title: Easy Installation Product
Reviews.Author: nightowl
Reviews.Content: This product makes security systems in automobiles very easy.  The price for me was $0.01 for ten!!!  Couldn't be happier.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: This product made it possible to make clean & simple connections to the CCTV power supply.  It also make the process quick & easy.

Reviews.Title: Makes wire in to power cables...
Reviews.Author: Woodlandsman "Woodlandsman"
Reviews.Content: Just a simple, direct solution to getting things hooked up. Sometimes I wonder how they can make any money off these things - you'd have a hard time making even one! Good luck!

Reviews.Title: Just the right length
Reviews.Author: Harley Guy
Reviews.Content: Just what I needed. Wire is 22 ga. ,but it will work just fine for what I am doing. No PTZ cameras, just standard. I was glas I didn't need to splice the wires.

Reviews.Title: SEEMED OK, WORKED
Reviews.Author: L. E. WAGNER "ERIK"
Reviews.Content: WHAT MORE CAN I SAY? IT IS WHAT IT IS AND WHEN YOU NEED SOME THING YOU TRY FOR THE BEST PRICE BUT ALSO GOOD QUALITY

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: andrew "PFC Brian"
Reviews.Content: Wires are thin but for the amount of power i am using it works good.  All in all great product

Reviews.Title: CCTV pigtails
Reviews.Author: Art M "Moses"
Reviews.Content: Basic pigtails for using a BNC cable to an CCTV power supply box. Adequate no negative or over achieving performance to write about.

Reviews.Title: work great
Reviews.Author: JacksGP
Reviews.Content: I bought these to add remote power switch capability for my surveillance cameras.  These work great with the camera cables.

Reviews.Title: just what I needed
Reviews.Author: BobL
Reviews.Content: It looks as well made as it can possibly be for an item of this type. I haven't installed any yet, but a quick electrical test shows they will work fine

Reviews.Title: cctv DC male Plugs
Reviews.Author: Maurice H. Nelson
Reviews.Content: Product was great, and price was what it stood for, recommend to any buyer, for the job needing to be done

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: anthony smith
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this product.  I will definitely buy more of these  for all of my camera jobs.

Reviews.Title: Universal and easy to use
Reviews.Author: Dan Robbins
Reviews.Content: The pre-tinned bare ends make it especially nice to connect wires via either wire locks or soldered, heat-shrink connections. This plug fits every camera/DVR system I've encountered. I use them with my 12VDC power distribution panel as the ends conform nicely to the screw terminals.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: patel123
Reviews.Content: used it for my cctv camerasFirst of all it had no pos to neg label to thembut they work good

Reviews.Title: Worked
Reviews.Author: Peter M. Plass
Reviews.Content: They worked, Just like the female versions, Pre tinned, Cut ends and crimped to lines. Found the exposed tin end to be weak and fray where the jacket starts

Reviews.Title: Looks pretty good.
Reviews.Author: Ray562
Reviews.Content: I did not use this item because the wiring looked like it was to small.I chose a better adapter to use.

Reviews.Title: Good source for power plug
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: They work well.  They were inexpensive.  They arrived quickly.  Not really much else to say about them.  In general, I wish there were fewer different sizes of these power barrel plugs but these were right for my project.

Reviews.Title: The only pigtails I use for my installations!
Reviews.Author: Frankie
Reviews.Content: These pigtails are by far the best ones I have used. They are easy to identify unlike the majority of pig tails I have bought in the past. I highly recommend these to professionals looking to provide a high quality installation.

Reviews.Title: Worked but cables are not three feet long.
Reviews.Author: Greg Broiles
Reviews.Content: The ones I received were more like a foot long. They worked anyway but I had wanted the extra length for a little more installation flexibility. It's too much trouble to uninstall/remove/replace them so I'm keeping the shorter ones.

Reviews.Title: Did the job fine
Reviews.Author: Sir Lion
Reviews.Content: Used this to mate my CCTV camera to spool siamese power pigtail.  Worked perfectly.  After twisted the wires together, I used the screwable plastic caps and then waterproofed the mating with electrical tape.

Reviews.Title: They work but are very low quality.
Reviews.Author: MoMule
Reviews.Content: As some other reviews pointed out and I must have missed the first time since I ordered 10 male and 10 female pieces of these pigtails they work just know there is very little wire in these connectors by far the smallest braid I have ever used so small in fact I had a hard tome getting my crimp on splice connectors to stay on. I usually shop Amazon largely based on the reviews of others so my guess as to why these pigtails got such good reviews was because many people that ordered these probably haven't seen a proper pigtail which are usually 10x as thick.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu 10 pc Pigtail Cables
Reviews.Author: David Prokop "Dave"
Reviews.Content: They are well made and work as advertised.  They save alot of time on a camera install.  Not for high draw cameras as they are made of smaller gauge wire (<18ga).

Reviews.Title: Excellent Construction, easy to install and monitor.
Reviews.Author: Wilbur Lidzy "GuateStudio"
Reviews.Content: I am an installer and if I had known about this years ago I wouldn't have installed anything else.  Solid construction, easy installation.

Reviews.Title: Price is great and I have tested it.
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: Used to wire power to in cabinet and below cabinet LED lights. Hardwired to a 12V relay and magnetic cabinet door switches to supply all the light I need. used 2 of these in the installation of the LED's

Reviews.Title: Perfect for hooking my cams into my power distibution center.
Reviews.Author: Jim B
Reviews.Content: These are excellent for hooking my cams into my power distibution center. I'd buy these again if ever needed for this purpose.

Reviews.Title: arrived in 1 day from ordering
Reviews.Author: Jwubs
Reviews.Content: quickly came in mail,I use these for LED strips along with my Rechargeable 3800mah li-ion 12v Battery 1A Pack with DC Connectorso far they are great and connect without any problem.

ProductInfo.Features:
Center positive 2.1mm DC plug
Molded male connectors
Outside diameter: 5.5mm
Inside diameter: 2.1mm
Easy to install
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 10 Pieces 36 Inch CCTV Security Camera DC Male Power Plug Pigtail Cables PC01T C58
